sbmod.midnightconfig.title: Skyblock Configuration
sbmod.midnightconfig.saveDeath.tooltip:
§aTeleports you home if you are in 
the void or below 1 full heart
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleChatAfk.toolt:
§aThis makes it so you move one 
block forward if the you cant message 
until you move is sent
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleMessageLogs.t:
§aToggles whether to log 
 private messages or not
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleTradeLogs.too:
§aToggles whether to log 
 trade messages or not
sbmod.midnightconfig.staffCheck.tooltip:
§aSends messages to you letting know 
which staff member has joined/left
sbmod.midnightconfig.wanderingTrader.too:
§aSends a title to your screen telling 
you that there is a wandering 
trader at spawn
sbmod.midnightconfig.vpLlama.tooltip:
§aSends a title to your screen telling 
you that there is a vote party llama at spawn
sbmod.midnightconfig.alertSounds.tooltip:
§aToggles whether you want sounds 
or not for alerts and notifications
sbmod.midnightconfig.clagWarning.tooltip:
§aSends you a warning title 
if clag is happening in 
20 seconds or less
sbmod.midnightconfig.lotteryTickets: The amount of lottery ticket to buy
sbmod.midnightconfig.interval: Amount of time in ticks between autoadvert messages (20*seconds)
sbmod.midnightconfig.announcements.toolt:
§aIf there is an announcement 
displays in actionbar
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleMail.tooltip:
§aThis toggles off all mail notifications 
after the first one sent 
when you join the game
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleMotds.tooltip:
§aThis toggles of motds when 
you visit an island 
§cThis cancels any message that 
§cstarts with '+ '
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleWelcomeMessag:
§aIf you really want, this gives you the 
ability to turn off the on join world message 
§cThis will disable outdated version notifications
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleTips.tooltip:
§aToggles off the skyblock servers 
tips (shop,lock/unlock,settings etc.)
§aToggles the player advancements 
that are sent in chat
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleNewPlayerWelc:
§aToggles the welcome of new 
players to the server
sbmod.midnightconfig.togglePlayerVoted.t:
§aToggles the notification sent 
when a player votes
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleFriendJoin.to:
§aToggles the notification you 
get when a friend joins
sbmod.midnightconfig.togglePlayersPerish:
§aToggles the notification of 
the amount of players that 
have died in the void today
sbmod.midnightconfig.joinCommands.toolti:
§aSends join commands upon 
entering a world
sbmod.midnightconfig.toggleNotify.toolti:
§aThis makes it so a sound is 
played when your name is 
said in chat
sbmod.midnightconfig.hoverHack.tooltip:
§aInstead of making you hover 
for the word, it will 
just tell you the word
